Mod Problems
When ever I load BD Armoury into KSP, I have this weird bug where, when I try to fly something, the SAS apparently tries to lock on to everything (ie. Prograde, Retrograde), the time is set to what seems to be the largest it can be, while the screen doesnt go to the ship but instead looks at the KSC, before zooming the camera off into space. I've installed the mod files in GameData, so could anyone see whese I messed up?

Please click on the BDArmory link in my signature below.  Then read the support section of the first post.  Follow those steps to either solve your problem or if the issue persists, provide the info we need to be able to help you.
